Hilber, Christian, and Christopher Mayer (2004), Why Do Households without Children Support Local Schools? NBER Working Paper #10804.
Haughwout, Andrew, Richard Peach, and Joseph Tracy (2008), Juvenile Delinquent Mortgages: Bad Credit or Bad Economy, Journal of Urban Economics (forthcoming).
